jobs.title: CRO Strategist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Why Moonshot AI?

Imagine websites that rebuild themselves on autopilot to sell more, convert better, and grow faster.
At Moonshot AI, we’re making that happen — merging generative AI, large-scale data pipelines, and experimentation into a self-evolving web.

We’re a well-funded, very early-stage startup with a massive vision. Joining now means you’re not just an employee — you’re helping set the technical and cultural DNA of the company. If you’ve ever wanted the autonomy of a founder with the backing of top-tier investors, this is it.

The role

We're seeking a data-driven CRO Strategist to lead conversion rate optimization for our direct-to-consumer e-commerce clients. You'll own the strategy and execution of high-impact testing programs that drive measurable improvements in conversion rates, while ensuring strong client relationships and satisfaction.

What You'll Do

  • Lead CRO strategy and execution for multiple DTC e-commerce accounts, from audits and roadmaps to A/B testing and reporting

  • Design and implement experimentation programs including A/B and multivariate testing, analyzing user behavior to identify optimization opportunities

  • Establish KPIs and create testing roadmaps for advertising (campaigns, landing pages) and websites (UX, checkout, conversion flows)

  • Serve as strategic partner to clients, providing expert guidance on CRO methodologies and communicating results clearly to stakeholders

  • Build and maintain a strong testing pipeline that continuously answers the needs of clients and their customers

What You'll Bring

  • 3+ years of CRO experience with DTC e-commerce brands, preferably in an agency setting

  • Strong client-facing skills with proven track record of managing complex relationships and delivering measurable conversion improvements

  • Expert knowledge of A/B and multivariate testing methodologies, statistical validity, and experimentation best practices

  • Proficiency with CRO tools (Optimizely, VWO, Adobe Target, Google Optimize), analytics (GA4), and research tools (Hotjar, Fullstory, Crazy Egg, Clarity)

  • Strong analytical skills with ability to identify friction points, translate data into actionable insights, and make sound recommendations

  • Knowledge of e-commerce best practices, consumer psychology, and UX/UI principles that drive conversions

  • Results-oriented problem-solver who thrives in fast-paced environments and isn't afraid to learn from failed tests

What Success Looks Like

  • Effectively manage multiple DTC e-commerce accounts

  • Meet department KPIs including client growth, North Star Metrics, and satisfaction scores

  • Build client trust that drives renewals and cross-sell opportunities

  • Deliver measurable improvements in client conversion rates and revenue

At Moonshot, culture isn’t fluff — it’s how we win

  • Curiosity & Growth → We challenge assumptions, ask big questions, and push for mastery.

  • Low Ego → No ivory towers — everyone gets their hands dirty.

  • Ownership → You own outcomes, not just outputs. Shipping is step one; impact is the goal.

  • Trust → Radical transparency and accountability, even when it’s hard.

  • Agility → We move fast, test faster, and aren’t afraid to pivot.

  • This Is Your Company → Ideas fuel breakthroughs. We’re all builders here.

  • Enjoy the Ride → Startups are a rollercoaster — we create good vibes and celebrate wins together.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary

  • Meaningful equity — real ownership in Moonshot AI’s success.

  • Full health coverage (medical, dental, vision) for you + your family.

  • Unlimited PTO — we trust you to take the time you need.

  • Office-first culture (4 days/week) — Midtown Manhattan, in the middle of it all.

  • Work directly with the founding team — your impact is immediate, visible, and career-defining.

  • Backed by top investors in NYC, SF, and TLV.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Why Moonshot AI?

Imagine websites that rebuild themselves on autopilot to sell more, convert better, and grow faster.
At Moonshot AI, we’re making that happen — merging generative AI, large-scale data pipelines, and experimentation into a self-evolving web.

We’re a well-funded, very early-stage startup with a massive vision. Joining now means you’re not just an employee — you’re helping set the technical and cultural DNA of the company. If you’ve ever wanted the autonomy of a founder with the backing of top-tier investors, this is it.

What You’ll Build & Achieve

As our Senior Fullstack Engineer, you’ll be hands-on across the stack — designing, building, and scaling systems that power our AI-driven platform. Expect autonomy, speed, and a ton of ownership.

  • Architect and build scalable systems — from backend APIs to frontend dashboards — that process tens of millions of web events per day.

  • Design large-scale data infrastructure that explains how websites are built, why they perform the way they do, and how to optimize them.

  • Train and integrate LLMs into production to automatically hypothesize, generate, and validate website variants.

  • Shape engineering culture & practices — your fingerprints will be all over our tech stack, architecture, and team processes.

  • Experiment, prototype, and iterate — research + product + AI + scale, all at once.

This isn’t about maintaining yet another SaaS app — it’s about building an AI engine that redefines how digital products are created.

Who We’re Looking For

  • A software craftsman — you write clean, scalable code and know how to ship at speed.

  • 5+ years fullstack experience (Python, JS, AWS preferred, but not a blocker).

  • Experience leading teams or driving major projects.

  • Background in CS, EE, Math, or equivalent hands-on mastery.

  • An AI enthusiast who wants to build with LLMs and shape how they’re applied in the real world.

Bonus Points:

  • Startup experience (you thrive in zero-to-one).

  • Experience training or deploying ML models in production.

At Moonshot, culture isn’t fluff — it’s how we win

  • Curiosity & Growth → We challenge assumptions, ask big questions, and push for mastery.

  • Low Ego → No ivory towers — everyone gets their hands dirty.

  • Ownership → You own outcomes, not just outputs. Shipping is step one; impact is the goal.

  • Trust → Radical transparency and accountability, even when it’s hard.

  • Agility → We move fast, test faster, and aren’t afraid to pivot.

  • This Is Your Company → Ideas fuel breakthroughs. We’re all builders here.

  • Enjoy the Ride → Startups are a rollercoaster — we create good vibes and celebrate wins together.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary

  • Meaningful equity — real ownership in Moonshot AI’s success.

  • Full health coverage (medical, dental, vision) for you + your family.

  • Unlimited PTO — we trust you to take the time you need.

  • Office-first culture (4 days/week) — Midtown Manhattan, in the middle of it all.

  • Work directly with the founding team — your impact is immediate, visible, and career-defining.

  • Backed by top investors in NYC, SF, and TLV.

jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Why Moonshot AI?

Imagine websites that rebuild themselves on autopilot to sell more, convert better, and grow faster.
At Moonshot AI, we’re making that happen — merging generative AI, large-scale data pipelines, and experimentation into a self-evolving web.

We’re a well-funded, very early-stage startup with a massive vision. Joining now means you’re not just an employee — you’re helping set the technical and cultural DNA of the company. If you’ve ever wanted the autonomy of a founder with the backing of top-tier investors, this is it.

What You’ll Build & Achieve

You’ll touch every part of the stack and learn how to build systems that scale to millions of users. This isn’t a “ticket taker” job — you’ll be writing real production code from day one.

  • Build and ship features across our frontend dashboards and backend APIs.

  • Work with massive data streams that track millions of web events daily.

  • Help train and integrate AI models that suggest and test website improvements.

  • Collaborate with senior engineers to design scalable systems and best practices.

  • Prototype fast, test constantly, and learn how to turn ideas into shipped features in days.

  • This role is about learning through impact — the more you contribute, the faster you’ll grow.

Who We’re Looking For

  • 0–3 years of experience building web applications.

  • Comfortable with Python, JavaScript, and modern frameworks (React, Node, Flask, etc.).

  • Strong computer science fundamentals (or equivalent practical experience).

  • Excited about AI, experimentation, and startups.

  • Hungry to learn, unafraid to ask questions, and eager to ship.

Bonus Points:

  • Startup experience.

  • Experience playing with LLMs, ML models, or data pipelines.

  • A non-trivial portfolio, GitHub, or side projects you’re proud of.

At Moonshot, culture isn’t fluff — it’s how we win

  • Curiosity & Growth → We challenge assumptions, ask big questions, and push for mastery.

  • Low Ego → No ivory towers — everyone gets their hands dirty.

  • Ownership → You own outcomes, not just outputs. Shipping is step one; impact is the goal.

  • Trust → Radical transparency and accountability, even when it’s hard.

  • Agility → We move fast, test faster, and aren’t afraid to pivot.

  • This Is Your Company → Ideas fuel breakthroughs. We’re all builders here.

  • Enjoy the Ride → Startups are a rollercoaster — we create good vibes and celebrate wins together.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary

  • Meaningful equity — real ownership in Moonshot AI’s success.

  • Full health coverage (medical, dental, vision) for you + your family.

  • Unlimited PTO — we trust you to take the time you need.

  • Office-first culture (4 days/week) — Midtown Manhattan, in the middle of it all.

  • Work directly with the founding team — your impact is immediate, visible, and career-defining.

  • Backed by top investors in NYC, SF, and TLV.
